column4: Well, the problem is that, in Firefox, all the links are different sizes
And they are kinda annoying
If you like, I can show you a screenshot of what im talking about
Is it me, or in Firefox under the tools, there is no option menu?
Whoa thanks a million!
Iv been searching for that
In windows, its under tools
Thanks, I found it
Another question, is it me or does firefox show different sized fonts?
Here, I will show you what I mean
it does and it irks me no end
is there a cure for that or I mean a option to fix that?
show me what you see on Google.com
not that I have found so far
the fonts for the actual content are in the preferences but for the menus and dialog boxes I can not find
Alright, this is what Google & some of my screen looks like
http://i2.photobucket.com/albums/y28/kylewitt/VeryWeird.png
if you look on it, you will see the font and things are kinda hard to read and on the right of google where it says "Advanced Search" and things, its kinda smaller
Then when I go to Photobucket.com, the fonts are all outta wack
you can change that in the preferences
What should I set the font & font size to then?
Alright, lemme check
just increase the size by a couple of points
